events.name: US and EU to pledge joint action on China concerns
events.wd_label: US and EU to pledge joint action on China concerns
events.wd_description: The US and EU will pledge joint action to address concerns about China's non-market practices and coordinate export controls on semiconductors and other goods at a meeting later this month.
events.description: The US and EU will pledge joint action to address concerns about China's non-market practices and coordinate export controls on semiconductors and other goods at a meeting later this month.

events.name: Upcoming meeting details
events.wd_description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, EU Vice-President Margarethe Vestager, and other senior officials will meet in Lulea, Sweden, on May 30-31 for the fourth edition of the EU-U.S. Trade and Technology Council (TTC).
events.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, EU Vice-President Margarethe Vestager, and other senior officials will meet in Lulea, Sweden, on May 30-31 for the fourth edition of the EU-U.S. Trade and Technology Council (TTC).

events.name: Coordination on export controls
events.wd_description: They plan to coordinate controls on sensitive items, including goods with military use and semiconductors.
events.description: They plan to coordinate controls on sensitive items, including goods with military use and semiconductors.

events.name: Cooperation on information manipulation
events.wd_description: They aim to cooperate to counter foreign manipulation of information, including China's amplification of Russian disinformation narratives about the war in Ukraine.
events.description: They aim to cooperate to counter foreign manipulation of information, including China's amplification of Russian disinformation narratives about the war in Ukraine.

events.name: Alleged Russian strike in Dnipro
events.wd_description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.
events.description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.

events.name: Details of the strike
events.wd_description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.
events.description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.

events.name: Explosions in Kyiv
events.wd_description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.
events.description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.

events.name: Scientists Warn of Rising Global Environmental Threats
events.wd_label: Scientists Warn of Rising Global Environmental Threats
events.wd_description: Scientists from the Earth Commission have provided evidence that the world is facing increasing challenges related to water supply, fertilizer usage, ecosystem management, and aerosol pollution, threatening the stability of life-support systems and exacerbating socioeconomic inequality.
events.description: Scientists from the Earth Commission have provided evidence that the world is facing increasing challenges related to water supply, fertilizer usage, ecosystem management, and aerosol pollution, threatening the stability of life-support systems and exacerbating socioeconomic inequality.

events.name: Rising Environmental Threats
events.wd_description: Scientists have identified growing problems in water supply, fertilizer loading, ecosystem management, and aerosol pollution as major threats to the environment and human well-being.
events.description: Scientists have identified growing problems in water supply, fertilizer loading, ecosystem management, and aerosol pollution as major threats to the environment and human well-being.

events.name: Tipping Points and Stability of Life-Support Systems
events.wd_label: Tipping Points and Stability of Life-Support Systems
events.wd_description: The Earth Commission warns that we are approaching tipping points where the Earth's biophysical systems may no longer remain stable, leading to severe damage to global life-support systems.
events.description: The Earth Commission warns that we are approaching tipping points where the Earth's biophysical systems may no longer remain stable, leading to severe damage to global life-support systems.

events.name: Safe and Just Environmental Criteria
events.wd_description: The study establishes "safe and just" environmental criteria, similar to vital signs for the human body, to monitor key indicators like water flow, phosphorus usage, and land conversion.
events.description: The study establishes "safe and just" environmental criteria, similar to vital signs for the human body, to monitor key indicators like water flow, phosphorus usage, and land conversion.

events.name: Ford's EV Production Expansion
events.wd_description: Ford Motor Company announced long-term contracts with multiple lithium suppliers to secure raw materials for scaling its electric vehicle production.
events.description: Ford Motor Company announced long-term contracts with multiple lithium suppliers to secure raw materials for scaling its electric vehicle production.

events.name: Lithium Supplier Agreements
events.wd_description: Ford has secured long-term lithium supply deals with multiple suppliers across three countries, with partnerships guaranteed through at least 2034.
events.description: Ford has secured long-term lithium supply deals with multiple suppliers across three countries, with partnerships guaranteed through at least 2034.

events.name: Albemarle Partnership
events.wd_description: Ford and Albemarle are exploring options to develop a closed-loop solution for lithium-ion battery recycling.
events.description: Ford and Albemarle are exploring options to develop a closed-loop solution for lithium-ion battery recycling.

events.name: Global Supplier Pool
events.wd_description: Ford has secured mineral agreements in Asia, South America, and North America to ensure a stable supply of raw materials.
events.description: Ford has secured mineral agreements in Asia, South America, and North America to ensure a stable supply of raw materials.

events.name: Supply Chain Development
events.wd_description: Ford is developing a more sustainable North American battery supply chain to fortify and de-risk its plans for sourcing key minerals.
events.description: Ford is developing a more sustainable North American battery supply chain to fortify and de-risk its plans for sourcing key minerals.

events.name: Indonesia Nickel Facility
events.wd_description: Ford invested in an Indonesia-based nickel facility set to open in 2026 to expand its supplier base.
events.description: Ford invested in an Indonesia-based nickel facility set to open in 2026 to expand its supplier base.

events.name: Production Site Expansions
events.wd_description: Ford is expanding its EV production sites across the U.S., including a $3.5 billion investment for its first lithium iron phosphate EV battery plant in Michigan.
events.description: Ford is expanding its EV production sites across the U.S., including a $3.5 billion investment for its first lithium iron phosphate EV battery plant in Michigan.
